member.name: AUDIO_EFFECT.id
member.summary: The GUID identifier for an audio effect. Audio effect GUIDs are defined in ksmedia.h.

member.name: AUDIO_EFFECT.canSetState
member.summary: A boolean value specifying whether the effect state can be modified.

member.name: AUDIO_EFFECT.state
member.summary: A member of the enumeration specifying the state of the audio effect.
